welcome_message.paragraph: Cette visualisation montre les éditions imprimées des Sept Sages de Rome.

tutorial.title: Your journey starts here
tutorial.content: Click the spyglass button to enter a text search of the loaded map data.
Or click the filter button below to open the filter panel.

tutorial.title: The Filter Panel
tutorial.content: With the filter panel open, the map shows different types of data in different colors.
You can cycle through the available filter categories by clicking the arrows.

You can filter the data on the map by clicking the labels.

If you select a language, you will see in the next filter all the manuscripts in this particular language.

tutorial.title: That's it!
tutorial.content: Thanks for taking the time. Have fun exploring our data visualisation for MARK16. If you want to know more about the Peripleo software, click here.
